titleStmt.title: Another great and bloody plot against His Highness the Lord Protector, and the Lords of His Honourable Council with the particulars thereof, and the manner how a great and dreadfull blow should have been given on Christmass Day : likewise a list of the names of some of the chief conspirators, their oath of secresie touching fire-locks and blunderbusses, and the several examinations and confessions.

Another great and bloody plot against His Highness the Lord Protector, and the Lords of His Honourable Council with the particulars thereof, and the manner how a great and dreadfull blow should have been given on Christmass Day : likewise a list of the names of some of the chief conspirators, their oath of secresie touching fire-locks and blunderbusses, and the several examinations and confessions.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The particulars of another great plot against the Lord Protector, and a narrative of the conspirators, extracted from them at their examination, &c.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
